## How to Get ABS

Reduce the fat: it will come.

- Calorie deficit of diet + activity
- Requires ZERO AB training

Sometimes abs are very small

- RARE, but can be trained
  
## What Ab Training Can Not Do

1. 减少腹部脂肪
2. 改变腹肌形态
    - 基因only
3. 让腰围缩小
    - 更多腹肌只会让腰围更宽
    - 体操运动员女生需要de-train来让腰围缩小

## How to Train properly

1. Bigger - 5~30
2. Stronger - 3~6
3. Endurance - Speific sport movement
4. Crisp - Calorie deficit
